### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Ore Mine at position(x=-17.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-17.0, y=-50.0) 
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) 
-  Transport belt (position x=-16.5, y=-51.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=-15.5, y=-51.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=-14.5, y=-51.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=-13.5, y=-51.5)

### Iron Plate Factory at position(x=-10.0, y=-49.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=-10.0, y=-49.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=-13.5, y=-50.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=-13.5, y=-48.5)
-  Belt group with 4 belts (position x=-17.5 to x=-12.5, y=-51.5)
-  Belt group with 2 belts (position x=-12.5, y=-46.5 to y=-49.5)

### Storage at position(x=-16.5, y=-47.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Wooden chest (position x=-16.5, y=-47.5)
-  Burner inserter (position x=-16.5, y=-46.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drill but being out of fuel
-  Make sure to fuel the burner mining drill before using it
### Errors when using burner mining drill but output is blocked
-  Ensure there is a sink entity in place to accept the output
### Errors when using furnace but being out of fuel
-  Make sure to fuel the furnace before using it
### Errors when using burner inserter but waiting for source items
-  Ensure the inserter has source items to pick up

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
Important variables:
* `wooden-chest`: type `Entity`, assigned value `Entity(name='wooden-chest', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=-16.5, y=-47.5), energy=0.0, status=EntityStatus.NORMAL, inventory=Inventory({}), height=1.0, width=1.0)`
* `burner-mining-drill`: type `Entity`, assigned value `Entity(name='burner-mining-drill', direction=Direction.DOWN, position=Position(x=-17.0, y=-50.0), energy=0.0, warnings=['out of fuel', 'output blocked by item on the ground. There is no sink entity in place to accept the output.'], status=EntityStatus.NO_FUEL, neighbours=[...])`
* `stone-furnace`: type `Entity`, assigned value `Entity(name='stone-furnace', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=-10.0, y=-49.0), energy=0.0, warnings=['out of fuel'], status=EntityStatus.NO_FUEL, furnace_source=Inventory({'iron-ore': 1}), furnace_result=Inventory({'iron-plate': 55}), height=2.0, width=2.0)`
